snippet: The Nederland Dans Theater anchored a gala for the Joyce Theater Foundation on Wednesday at the David H. Koch Theater.
abstract: Gia Kourlas reviews performance by Nederland Dans Theater as part of gala presentation for Joyce Theater Foundation at David H Koch Theater.
lead_paragraph: The Nederland Dans Theater anchored a gala for the Joyce Theater Foundation on Wednesday at the David H. Koch Theater.

headline.seo: Nederland Dans Theater at Joyce Foundation Gala
headline.main: If You Don’t Like the View, Just Wait a Few Measures
headline.print_headline: If You Don’t Like the View, Just Wait a Few Measures
